name: Amazing Dot Free - Great Circle
description:
NO in-app purchase!!!

Just PURE FUN!!!

Be warned: This game is insanely addictive and will test your skills.

******************************************************************************

In Amazing Dot Pro, avoid different obstacles such us rotating objects, moving objects, and very narrow space for moving your Amazing Dot.

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?
1. Tap on the play button to start the game.
2. Avoid different obstacles by swiping to the left or swiping to the right.
3. Pause or continue the game or go back to home menu.
4. Test your skills in avoiding moving, rotating, or narrow obstacles.
5. Rate the game and share it with your friends.

TIPS:
Swipe to the LEFT or swipe to the RIGHT with the right timing is the key to the game for survival.

Beat your own best score or past other players' best score in the Game Centre.

Other features:
- Share your score and screen on facebook, twitter or yahoo.
- Nice background music

Have fun playing the game.

Don't forget to right a review and rate it.

Thanks in advance.

******************************************************************************
